saac.account_avg_month_salary = #{accountAvgMonthSalary},
saac.account_salary_amount = #{accountSalaryAmount},
saac.account_emp_count = #{accountEmpCount},
saac.modified_time = NOW(), saac.modified_by = #{modifiedBy} WHERE saac.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) AND saac.is_active = 1 AND sacr.com_account_id = #{comAccountId}
